title: Ep. 622 - The Case For Secession
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, there has been a lot of talk in recent weeks about breaking up the country, having a national divorce. Today I will make my case for secession, but also explain why I think it will never happen. Also Five Headlines, including Biden hacking and wheezing his way through a speech. How long before President Harris officially takes over? Also, another business owner stands up against tyrannical health inspectors, and inmates at a jail in Pennsylvania complain that they are being persecuted by the dinner menu.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
